meta.title: 3/30/20 5:00 p.m. - HCSD: May 1st - School Closure - Hamilton City School District

meta.content: On March 30, 2020, Governor Mike DeWine made an announcement ordering all of Ohio’s public, community, and private K-12 school buildings to be closed to students through May 1st, 2020
